transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 derive(empno = toInteger(byName('empno')),
		ename = toString(byName('ename'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 derive(loadeddate = currentDate()) ~> loadeddate
loadeddate filter(toInteger(empno)==10) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(input(
		movie_title as string,
		actor_name as string,
		director_name as string,
		gross as integer,
		duration as integer,
		num_critic_for_reviews as integer,
		num_voted_users as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table') ~> sink1
